remarks: The subword of a concatenation of two words within the first of the concatenated words.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 28-Mar-2018.)
statement: swrdccatin1 $p |- ( ( A e. Word V /\ B e. Word V ) -> ( ( M e. ( 0 ... N ) /\ N e. ( 0 ... ( # ` A ) ) ) -> ( ( A concat B ) substr <. M , N >. ) = ( A substr <. M , N >. ) ) ) $.
